324.sentence: 3) Phone is kinda heavy, but small in size.

325.sentence: 4) Buttons are quite small and is really a pain exp if one is fond of text messaging.

326.sentence: There will be much erasing of text as, one would tend to type something instead of the actual letters.

327.sentence: 5) Video recorder is of no use and one cannot record something useful in 10 seconds and it takes a while to send the same through the "Free picture and video messaging" offered by service provider.

328.sentence: The bottom line is "Phone is cool one - only for the moment, as its the latest phone in the market and has all the new features, but this will soon be displaced by upcoming newer phones".

329.sentence: so, right out of the box i had issue.

331.sentence: after scouring the various boards i find this is an arbitrary and pervasive problem.

332.sentence: but, i am quite unhappy with nokia at the moment.

333.sentence: if you are looking for a phone to integrate as easily as the sonyericsson phones with iSync, i say stick with a sonyericsson.

334.sentence: if there was a zero-star rating i would give it.

335.sentence: It is a multifunction phone, reception quality is better than the 610.

336.sentence: speaker phone quality is good, and poping in a 512mb MMC card, it rocks !

337.sentence: putting in MP3 player, lots of games and application to download.

338.sentence: DOwnside is the size of the phone, it is BIG for today's standard.

339.sentence: and the battery life is bad !

340.sentence: I could hardly use it without a recharge in 2 days!

342.sentence: the GPRS web access is sloooooooooooooow!

343.sentence: I got this phone yesterday and didn't find any problems with it yet.

344.sentence: Picture and video quality is ok.

347.sentence: Aside from a 6MB++ built-in phone memory, there's a 32MB MMC card that goes with it!

348.sentence: Picture quality's great for still and video with sound.

349.sentence: you can record your voice and turn it into a ringtone.

350.sentence: you can't do that with a Sony T610 (which i traded for a 6600).

352.sentence: N6600 supports midi, wav, amr, mp3 etc.

353.sentence: it has a handsfree loudspeaker, conference and transfer!

355.sentence: This phone is one of the milestones in the history of the cellular phones.

356.sentence: Supporting an operating system, Symbian OS, you can download and run a lot of programs on this phone.

357.sentence: You can turn this phone into a gaming machine, a camcorder or a digital camera, an mp3-player, a movie viewer, a voice recorder, a personal secretary, a GPS map browser, a book, a multifunction remote controller, practically everything that you can do with the computer, plus it is a phone(!!) and also you can carry it in your pocket :).

358.sentence: Many of these programs are shareware, some can be purchased by paying a little bit of bucks.

359.sentence: It uses the extendable MMC memory, it is perfect for storing videos, pictures and mp3s.

360.sentence: Its nice look is also a plus.

361.sentence: And also, since it is tri band and since it uses SIM-card, you can just use it in Europe and many other parts of the world, wherever GSM exists.

362.sentence: I am just in love with this phone, especially after using a more primitve phone about 3 years.
